CityMania::PlayerIndexEventArgs

CityMania::PlayerIndexEventArgs Class Reference

Custom event argument which includes the index of the player who triggered the event. This is used by the MenuEntry.Selected event. More...

PlayerIndex PlayerIndex [get]
 Gets the index of the player who triggered this event.

Detailed Description

Custom event argument which includes the index of the player who triggered the event. This is used by the MenuEntry.Selected event.
